latex:
The sequence $(a_n)$ is defined recursively by $a_0=1$, $a_1=\sqrt[19]{2}$, and $a_n=a_{n-1}a_{n-2}^2$ for $n \ge 2$. What is the smallest positive integer $k$ such that the product $a_1a_2 \cdots a_k$ is an integer?\\
\\
$\textbf{(A)}\ 17 \qquad
\textbf{(B)}\ 18 \qquad
\textbf{(C)}\ 19 \qquad
\textbf{(D)}\ 20 \qquad
\textbf{(E)}\ 21$
